mapper.select: SELECT *,i.fname fitemname FROM tb_wps w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on w.fitemid = i.fid where w.fid = #{fid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_wps(fwpsnum, fversions, fproject_code, freport_number, fdegree, fevaluation_standard, fstabilivolt_system, fvalidity, fautomatic, fgroove_type, fmaterials, fthickness1,fthickness2, fdiameter, feles1, fimages_url, fimages_desc, fcategory, fshop_sign, fspecification, fmaterials_type, fmaterials_number1, fmaterials_specification1, fmaterials_number2, fmaterials_specification2, fsoldering_number, fposition, fdirection, felse2, ffront1, ffront2, freverse1, freverse2, freverse3, ftail, fpreheating_temperature, ftemperature, fPreheat_way, ftemperature_range, fsoaking_time, feles3, fscope, fnozzle, fdistance, fback_chipping, flayer_scope1, flayer_scope2, ftungsten_electrode, ftransient_mode, fmethod1, fmethod2, fitemid, fcreator, fcreatetime) values(#{fwpsnum},#{fversions},#{fproject_code},#{freport_number},#{fdegree},#{fevaluation_standard},#{fstabilivolt_system},#{fvalidity},#{fautomatic},#{fgroove_type},#{fmaterials},#{fthickness1},#{fthickness2},#{fdiameter},#{feles1},#{fimages_url},#{fimages_desc},#{fcategory},#{fshop_sign},#{fspecification},#{fmaterials_type},#{fmaterials_number1},#{fmaterials_specification1},#{fmaterials_number2},#{fmaterials_specification2},#{fsoldering_number},#{fposition},#{fdirection},#{felse2},#{ffront1},#{ffront2},#{freverse1},#{freverse2},#{freverse3}, #{ftail},#{fpreheating_temperature},#{ftemperature},#{fPreheat_way},#{ftemperature_range},#{fsoaking_time},#{feles3},#{fscope},#{fnozzle},#{fdistance},#{fback_chipping},#{flayer_scope1},#{flayer_scope2},#{ftungsten_electrode},#{ftransient_mode},#{fmethod1},#{fmethod2},#{fitemid},#{fcreator},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_wps where FWPSNum=#{fwpsnum}
